title: Queen's Folly
description: According to author, Elyswith Thane, "during the historical research on The Tudor Wench (her previous novel), a man carried a secret message to Elizabeth which probably saved her life at the time of the Lady Jane Grey tragedy. History acknowledges him for a few hours only, and after three hundred and eighty-three years there is no way to trace him..." Spanning the years of 1553 to 1938, this is a novel to cherish.
author: Elswyth Thane
